language.label: Language
language.description: Select display language for the interface.

telemetry.label: Allow sending telemetry diagnostic data
telemetry.description: Allow program to upload error logs that do not contain privacy data to the telemetry server.

gameMode.label: Game Mode
gameMode.description: Automatically disable DirectML when high GPU load is detected to reduce impact on game performance
gameMode.requires_dml: Requires DirectML acceleration to be enabled first
gameMode.permanent: DirectML disabled (too many switches, will restore on restart)

monitor.title: Monitor Service
monitor.description: Control the background screenshot & OCR service.

autoStart.label: Auto-start Subservice
autoStart.description: When enabled the app will attempt to launch the Python subservice on startup.
autoStart.tooltip: Automatically start screenshot/OCR background on app launch

autoLaunch.label: Auto Launch at Startup
autoLaunch.description: Writes to HKLM; administrative confirmation may be required.
autoLaunch.enabledMessage: Enabled: CarbonPaper will start on system startup
autoLaunch.disabledMessage: Disabled: Will not start with system

protection.title: Protected by Windows CNG
protection.description: Your snapshot data is encrypted using credentials managed by Windows CNG. Only authorized access can decrypt it.

session.title: Auto-lock timeout
session.description: Set how long of inactivity before automatic lock requiring re-authentication.

advanced.warning: These settings may affect monitor service performance and system stability. Adjust carefully.

cpu.title: Python subprocess CPU limits
cpu.label: Limit CPU usage
cpu.description: Limit CPU resources used for OCR and embeddings to avoid impacting system performance
cpu.changed_notice: CPU limit changes take effect when the monitor service restarts

ocr.title: OCR processing queue
ocr.pause_label: Pause captures when OCR queue has work
ocr.pause_desc: When enabled, pauses captures while there are unprocessed OCR tasks to reduce resource usage
ocr.queue_limit_desc: Pause captures until queue is drained when above this size
ocr.info: OCR queue settings take effect immediately without restarting the monitor service

dml.title: OCR inference acceleration
dml.label: Use DirectML for inference
dml.description: When enabled, uses GPU for OCR inference acceleration; requires DirectX 12 compatible GPU
dml.changed_notice: DirectML changes take effect when the monitor service restarts

storageManagement.title: Storage Management
storageManagement.description: Manage snapshot storage space and data retention policy

storagePath.label: Storage Location
storagePath.description: Select and migrate the directory used for snapshots and database
storagePath.migrateQuestion: Migrate existing data files to the new directory?

storageLimit.label: Snapshot storage limit
storageLimit.description: Old snapshots will be deleted automatically when exceeded

retention.label: Snapshot retention period
retention.description: Snapshots older than this period will be pruned

warning.title: Warning
warning.message: Current settings allow unlimited storage and permanent retention; snapshots may consume large disk space. Consider setting reasonable limits or retention.

processes.label: Ignore by process name
processes.hint: Matches by executable name, automatically lowercased.

ignoreProtected.label: Do not capture protected windows
ignoreProtected.description: When disabled, attempts to capture windows that have screen-protected attributes.

quickDelete.title: Quick Delete Records
quickDelete.description: Quickly delete all screenshots and OCR records within the specified range. This action cannot be undone.

save_filters.synced: Saved and synced to monitor service
save_filters.saved_local_not_running: Saved locally; monitor service not running, will sync when started
save_filters.saved_local_unsupported: Saved locally, but current monitor process does not support filter commands. Please restart monitor service

ocr.title: OCR Keyword Search
ocr.description: Search by matching text recognized in screenshots

nl.title: Natural Language Search
nl.description: Describe the image content, scene or objects for semantic fuzzy search

sidebar.empty: Select an event from the timeline to view details.

dmlSetup.title: DirectML GPU Acceleration
dmlSetup.subtitle: This version supports GPU-accelerated OCR text recognition
dmlSetup.no_gpu: No compatible GPU detected. CPU inference will be used.
dmlSetup.no_gpu_note: You can change this later in Settings > Advanced.
dmlSetup.single_gpu_recommend: We recommend enabling DirectML acceleration for faster OCR, with Game Mode to protect gaming performance.
dmlSetup.multi_gpu_recommend: We recommend using the integrated GPU for OCR, leaving the discrete GPU free for games and primary applications.
dmlSetup.game_mode_hint: Automatically pauses acceleration under high GPU load
dmlSetup.game_mode_multi_gpu_note: Game Mode is not recommended when using an integrated GPU for OCR in a multi-GPU setup, unless both GPUs may be under load simultaneously.

authMask.title: Windows Hello verification required
authMask.description: Carbon Paper uses Windows Hello to encrypt your screenshots and OCR data. Please unlock using PIN, fingerprint, or face recognition.

errors.not_available: Windows Hello is not available; enable it in system settings

advancedSearch.title: Advanced

search.enter_keyword: Enter a keyword or choose filters to begin.
search.press_enter: Press Enter in the top search bar to jump here quickly.
search.adjust: Adjust filters or try different keywords.

advancedSearch.nl_notice: Results obtained using natural language image search may not be accurate.
rotating: This app is currently a toy!
LLM-powered search will be added in the future!
Amiya, hear me out, I really didn't favor Pelica...

backend_shutdown.title: Backend python services shutdown
backend_shutdown.description: Please enable the backend services to continue using the application.

start.waiting: Waiting for IPC to come up...

step1.title: Install Python v{{version}}
step1.subtitle: Step 1 / 3 — choose or install system Python

pythonPath.label: Python executable path
pythonPath.placeholder: e.g.: C:\Python310\python.exe or paste custom path

venv.discovered_label: Discovered Python versions (you may select one)
venv.note: Not sure what Python is? We can auto-install it. After install the app will exit and must be restarted.

step2.title: Install required dependencies
step2.subtitle: Step 2 / 3 — create venv and install requirements and model files
step2.disk_note: This will download ~1.7GB of model files; actual time depends on network and device performance.
step2.log_start: Starting venv creation and dependency installation...

first_run.title: First-time setup required
first_run.description: The application needs to install essential environment
